# NSFileProviderChangeObserver

**Protocol**

An observer that receives changes and deletions during enumeration.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSFileProviderChangeObserver : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Observing Changes

- **didDeleteItems(withIdentifiers:)**: Tells the observer that the specified items have been deleted.
- **didUpdate(_:)**: Tells the observer that the specified items have been updated.
- **finishEnumeratingChanges(upTo:moreComing:)**: Tells the observer that all of the changes have been enumerated up to the specified sync anchor.
- **finishEnumeratingWithError(_:)**: Tells the observer that an error occurred during change notification.
- **suggestedBatchSize**: The batch size that the system recommends.

## Change Tracking

- **Tracking Your File Provider’s Changes**: Create an enumerator to track changes to your file provider’s content.
- **NSFileProviderSyncAnchor**: A synchronization point that represents the last batch of changes returned by the enumerator.

- NSObjectProtocol
